Interface FlowChartModel

All Superinterfaces:
ChartModel
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultFlowChartModel
public interface FlowChartModel extends ChartModel
An extension of ChartModel for flow-based data, such as that required by Sankey or Alluvial diagrams. It describes a set of nodes and the links (edges) that flow between them.
Since:
2025-06-01
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Arber Gashi
